price: 73.Kaadu lacat maggo tuxxiq kee can kaak nakaanam Ion, a-niqmat keenih abe Rabbi ma-faatitaanaa?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
